SEARCH
Module com.example.finalassignment
Package Controller

Interface studentControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
studentController
public interface studentControllerInterface
The studentControllerInterface provides an interface for the controller in the MVC pattern for the Student Management System.

  • Method Details

    • addInfo

      void addInfo(javafx.scene.control.TextField NameField, javafx.scene.control.TextField IdField, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker dobField, javafx.scene.control.TextField currentSemester, javafx.scene.control.TextField tab1TextField)
      Adds student information to the database.
      Parameters:
      NameField - the TextField for the student's name
      IdField - the TextField for the student's ID
      dobField - the DatePicker for the student's date of birth
      currentSemester - the TextField for the student's current semester
      tab1TextField - the TextField to display success/error messages

    • removeInfo

      void removeInfo(javafx.scene.control.TextField IdField, javafx.scene.control.TextField tab1TextField)
      Remove students from the database.
      Parameters:
      IdField - the TextField for the student's ID
      tab1TextField - the TextField to display success/error messages

    • listStudent

      void listStudent(javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea, javafx.scene.control.TextField tab1TextField)
      Show the list of students in the database.
      Parameters:
      textArea - the TextArea to display the list of students
      tab1TextField - the TextField to display success/error messages

    • simulateMemoryLeak

      This method simulate the memory leak unit the heap space run out of memory

      Parameters:
      moduleField - the TextField for the module's name
      gradeField - the TextField for the module's grade
      semesterField - the TextField for the module's semester
      tab2textField - the TextField to display success/error messages

    • addGrade

      void addGrade(javafx.scene.control.TextField modulesGradeField, javafx.scene.control.TextField tab3textField) throws SQLException
      Add a grade for a module to the database.
      Parameters:
      modulesGradeField - the TextField for the module's grade
      tab3textField - the TextField to display success/error messages
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there was a problem with the database connection or query

    • modifyGrade

      void modifyGrade(javafx.scene.control.TextField modulesGradeField, javafx.scene.control.TextField tab3textField)
      Modify the grade of a module in the database.
      Parameters:
      modulesGradeField - the TextField for the module's new grade
      tab3textField - the TextField to display success/error messages

      void removeGrade(javafx.scene.control.TextField tab3textField)
